ProjectTitle: Housing Financialization in European Cities: Case Studies of Brussels and Warsaw
InitialFeedbackHistory:
04/11/2022
2. Data: Since you are doing interviews you will collect personal data of the interviewees, please submit a PRET application to register this as required by the GDPR, for more information see: https://admin.kuleuven.be/privacy/studpers/index. Please update your DMP and submit as intermediate when you have approval. 
What is the origin of the policy data, are these also publicly available or do 3rd party restrictions apply? 
3. Documentation: How will you document the interviews and related data so you and your colleagues understand the content? Will you use annotation software, a codebook etc? 
6. Sharing: Although you indicate that there are no factors that restrict sharing, you are not using a trusted data repository. Consider depositing your data in for example RDR under restricted acces, here your data will get a DOI and metadata to make it findable, others can  request access via RDR and you give acces after they sign an agreement, for more information see www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
label: intermediate DMP needed
